title: Shadow Assassin Dojo Adventure #18
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Ancient Training Hall
rooms.description: A spacious hall with polished wooden floors and walls lined with weapons. Training dummies stand in formation, and practice mats are rolled in the corner. Moonlight filters through paper screens, casting long shadows. The air smells of incense and old wood. Calligraphy scrolls hang on the walls, their messages speaking of discipline and honor.

items.name: wooden weapon rack
items.description: A rack displaying various training weapons - wooden swords, staffs, and practice shuriken

items.name: iron key
items.description: A heavy iron key with the dojo's symbol engraved on it

items.name: training equipment cabinet
items.description: A tall cabinet with three drawers containing training supplies

items.name: dojo founding scroll
items.description: An ancient scroll detailing the dojo's history
items.text: The Shadow Assassin Dojo was founded in the year 1847 by the legendary Master Takeshi. Our three sacred principles guide all who train here: Stealth, Honor, and Discipline. Only those who embody these virtues may access the Hidden Sanctuary.

items.name: silver key
items.description: A polished silver key with intricate engravings

items.name: calligraphy scrolls
items.description: Several scrolls with beautiful calligraphy hanging on the wall
items.text: The scrolls read: 'Through Stealth, we move unseen. Through Honor, we maintain our code. Through Discipline, we perfect our art. Master Takeshi's wisdom guides us always.'

items.name: practice training dummy
items.description: A wooden dummy used for striking practice, wrapped in straw

items.name: hidden note
items.description: A small note tucked inside the training dummy
items.text: Student's reminder: The combination to the middle drawer is the year our dojo was founded. Master Takeshi keeps important items in his chamber. The path to freedom lies in the Hidden Sanctuary.

items.name: wooden storage chest
items.description: A sturdy chest with an iron lock, used for storing valuable training equipment

items.name: training manual
items.description: A leather-bound manual with training techniques and philosophy
items.text: Shadow Assassin Training Manual: All students must master the three principles. Master Takeshi teaches that true strength comes from within. The Master's Chamber contains the deepest secrets of our art. Remember: Stealth is the first principle we learn.

items.name: sliding paper door
items.description: A traditional sliding door with paper panels, leading to the Master's Chamber

rooms.name: Master's Chamber
rooms.description: A serene chamber with minimal furnishings - a low table, meditation cushions, and a small shrine. Weapons of legendary quality are displayed on the walls. Incense burns slowly, filling the room with a calming scent. Ancient scrolls and texts line shelves carved into the walls. A concealed door to the east is barely visible in the shadows.

items.name: meditation cushions
items.description: Simple cushions arranged before a small shrine

items.name: scroll of wisdom
items.description: A scroll containing Master Takeshi's teachings
items.text: Master Takeshi's Wisdom: The three principles are the foundation of our way. First, Stealth - to move like shadow. Second, Honor - to uphold our code. Third, Discipline - to master ourselves. Only in the Hidden Sanctuary can one find true enlightenment.

items.name: legendary weapon display
items.description: A display case showing Master Takeshi's personal weapons
items.text: These weapons belonged to Master Takeshi, founder of our dojo. His katana, tanto, and shuriken are preserved here as sacred relics. A plaque reads: 'Master Takeshi - Founder and Eternal Guide.'

items.name: master's writing table
items.description: A low table with writing supplies and documents

items.name: Master Takeshi's journal
items.description: The personal journal of the dojo's founder
items.text: Final Entry: I have built this dojo to preserve the ancient arts. The Hidden Sanctuary is my greatest secret - a place of peace and escape. Only those who understand our three principles and know my name may enter. The shadow path leads to freedom.

items.name: shelf of ancient scrolls
items.description: Wooden shelves holding numerous scrolls and texts

items.name: text of principles
items.description: A detailed explanation of the dojo's three principles
items.text: The Three Sacred Principles: STEALTH - The art of moving unseen, striking from shadow. HONOR - The code that binds us, our unbreakable oath. DISCIPLINE - The training of mind and body, the path to mastery. These principles were established by Master Takeshi and must never be forgotten.

items.name: small shrine
items.description: A shrine dedicated to the dojo's founder
items.text: Shrine to Master Takeshi, Founder of the Shadow Assassin Dojo. May his teachings guide us forever. The Hidden Sanctuary awaits those worthy to enter.

items.name: concealed door
items.description: A hidden door cleverly disguised in the wall paneling. Three questions are carved into a small panel beside it.

password_questions.question: What is the first sacred principle?
password_questions.hint: Check the founding scroll and the text of principles

password_questions.question: Where does the shadow path lead?
password_questions.hint: Master Takeshi's journal and other texts mention this location

password_questions.question: Who founded this dojo?
password_questions.hint: Multiple scrolls and the shrine identify the founder

rooms.name: Hidden Sanctuary
rooms.description: You have discovered the Hidden Sanctuary! A peaceful chamber hidden deep within the dojo, untouched by time. A small garden with a koi pond occupies the center, and moonlight streams through an opening in the ceiling. Stone lanterns provide gentle illumination. At the far end, a secret passage leads to the outside world and freedom. You have proven yourself worthy.

items.name: tranquil koi pond
items.description: A serene pond with colorful koi fish swimming peacefully

items.name: stone lanterns
items.description: Ancient lanterns that still burn with a soft, eternal flame

items.name: memorial stone
items.description: A stone monument with an inscription
items.text: In memory of Master Takeshi, who created this sanctuary as a place of peace and a path to freedom. May all who find this place carry forward the principles of Stealth, Honor, and Discipline.

items.name: secret passage
items.description: A hidden tunnel leading to the outside world, your path to freedom

rooms.win_message: You have reached the Hidden Sanctuary and discovered the secret path to freedom! As you walk through the peaceful garden one last time, you feel the weight of Master Takeshi's wisdom. You have proven yourself worthy by mastering the puzzles and understanding the three sacred principles. The secret passage opens before you, leading to the outside world. You escape the Shadow Assassin Dojo with honor. You win!
